text_classification.prompt: Classify the following text into one of the predefined categories: ['IT Support', 'HR Request', 'Marketing', 'System Notification', 'Procurement']. Respond in JSON with keys 'category' and 'confidence':
data: Customer reported a payment failure while using the mobile app.
Employee requests additional training resources for new software.
Website traffic increased after launching the new marketing campaign.
System alert: Database backup completed successfully.
Supplier submitted an invoice for Q3 materials.

sentiment_analysis.prompt: Analyze the sentiment of the following text. Respond in JSON with keys 'sentiment' (positive, neutral, negative) and 'confidence':
data: The new feature is fantastic! It saves me so much time.
I’m disappointed with the quality of the product I received.
Customer support was okay, but response time could be faster.
The app crashes every time I try to upload a file.
Everything worked as expected, no issues at all.

After months of negotiations, the company announced a merger that will expand its presence in the European market.

A severe storm caused widespread power outages, prompting emergency services to work around the clock.
